attributes.action: consider when claiming housing benefit and council tax benefit that electric, gas & travel fare to work are classed as essential costs of living.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: when some one who is working applys  for housing benefit and council tax benefit the people only look at what you earn and not the fact that out of what you have left after tax and n.i. you have to pay for essentials like food, electric, gas, travel for work, we do not control the cost of living the goverment do so let them make up the difference.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
